meanings.definition: A type of fish found in North America.
meanings.sent1: The pikeminnows swam gracefully in the river.
meanings.sent2: Fishermen caught many pikeminnows during their fishing trip.
meanings.sent3: The pikeminnows had a family reunion in the deep waters.
meanings.sent4: The pikeminnows in the stream were like jewels in the water.
meanings.sent5: Children love watching the colorful pikeminnows in the pond.

meanings.sent1: We saw a school of pikeminnows swimming together.
meanings.sent2: The aquarium had a tank full of pikeminnows.
meanings.sent3: The pikeminnows decided to form a band and play underwater music.
meanings.sent4: The pikeminnows in the lake were a shimmering sight under the sun.
meanings.sent5: The pikeminnows darted around playfully in their tank.
